name: Centre for European Progression
goal:
Centre for European Progression is an independent NGO based in Brussels focusing on the young generation. Young people, researchers, euro bubble workers, experts, academic professionals who are dealing with European Affairs. We are a small knit-knot team with a horizontal structure and innovative ideas. We are an exceptionally motivated professional team with several years' international experience in policy research, following EU Institutions and managing day to day working flow activities. You will find us to be enthusiastic and extremely driven to achieve positive outcomes.
Our concept is to provide constructive atmosphere for discussion about the future of Europe in an informal, well-balanced and open way. We organise events, help young people publish their ideas and share their opinions, promoting always social improvement based on rule of law and democracy.
interests: Borders and Security, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Single market, Youth
euInitiatives:
Energy Union
Digital Single Market
Investment Plan (EFSI)
Migration
EMU
EU reform
Youth Employment Initiative
